name: Coolsled
description:
The winter is coming and the penguins begin to travel to warmer places, but one of them has an idea to shorten the path.

Slide down the mountain while dodging rocks and destroying blocks of "dirty snow" in this little mini game.

PLAY IT IN FULL SCREEN!

Controls:

Use WASD or the ARROW KEYS to move.

Shoot snowballs with "X" or "O" and Reload with "Z" or "P".

Game made exclusively for the "Great Winter Game Jam - 2020"

Sound effects obtained from : https://www.zapsplat.com
